Definition of Done (<stage>)

  • Tests/commands run: <list>
  • Outputs deterministic/JSON-safe: <yes/no>
  • Docs updated: <paths>
  • Data handling/PII reviewed: <notes>
  • Rollback/flags noted: <notes>
  • Issues/lessons logged: <notes>
